attributes.action: Please stop MALDON council from closing AA DOG RESCUE down
attributes.additional_details:
Local people volunteer and walk and interact with the dogs and other volunteers. 
In an age where community spirit is sadly disappearing AADR provide a safe haven for dogs and a chance for people to come together.
Please let it continue and grow, enabling people to give something back to the animals that others have failed. 
Please don't let them down but more importantly please be the voice for our unwanted strays. AADR are the only way to help these poor lost souls find their forever homes.
attributes.background:
We are asking that AA Dog Rescue are given the relevant planning permission to continue as a dog rescue. 
Their amazing work and dedication has so far saved the lives of over 1,500 dogs. Most would have been put to sleep.

rejection.details:
This petition concerns a matter that is the responsibility of Maldon District Council:
https://www.maldon.gov.uk/
